vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Cush = "black"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the peoples descended from Cush
n pr loc
2) the land occupied by the descendants of Cush located around the southern parts of the Nile (Ethiopia)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Cam; (b)   hombre; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
古實 这个字在外來字的意思是 "黑"
陽性專有名詞
1) 一個便雅敏人, 僅見於詩篇第七篇的調號標題
2) 含的兒子, 挪亞的孫子, 住在非洲南邊民族的始祖
3) 古實的後裔
專有名詞 地名
4) 古實的子孫居住的地方, 大約是在尼羅河南邊附近 (衣索比亞)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
古实 这个字在外来字的意思是 "黑"
阳性专有名词
1) 一个便雅敏人, 仅见于诗篇第七篇的调号标题
2) 含的儿子, 挪亚的孙子, 住在非洲南边民族的始祖
3) 古实的后裔
专有名词 地名
4) 古实的子孙居住的地方, 大约是在尼罗河南边附近 (衣索比亚)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at Psa.7.1
§ Cush = "black"
n pr m
a Benjamite mentioned only in the title of Ps 7:1

A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.6;
son of: Ham (H2526);
brother of: Canaan (H3667), Egypt (H4714) and Put (H6316);
father of: Seba (H5434), Havilah (H2341H), Sabtah (H5454), Raamah (H7484), Sabteca (H5455) and Nimrod (H5248)
§ Cush = "black"
n pr m
a Benjamite mentioned only in the title of Ps 7:1
